column3: “☠️🔥 Heisenberg would be proud. Walter White is an EXCEPTIONAL hybrid with a truly unique balance of flavors and a potent buzz to go with it. The aroma is that of a classic OG with an extra sharp piney smell and a sweet earthy undertone. Subtle citrus tones shine through as well. Beautifully frosted over with trichomes, this OG is definitely will please even the heaviest of tokers. This has quicky become one of my to...”

“Extremely fire strain. Had nice cerebral effect with a relaxing body sensation. It felt nice because I was upbeat and energetic, but relaxed and caked. I recommend this strain highly for any one needing potent medication.”

“Totally loving this strain from Mephisto Genetics. A solid cerebral shot, as well as an awesome body experience. With a fairly high THC, a true hybrid in every way! Lovin' me some Walter White! 🔥💨🔥💨🔥💨”

“Just grabbed some of this from the local dispensary! Huge thick dense nugs with lots of dark orange hairs. Has a nice citrusy taste, a little earthy as well. Half way through the half gram joint my whole body just started to feel tingly. My thoughts were immediately happy and at total calm. Shortly after it hits the brain and you're left with the perfect high. It's kind of like that feeling the first time smoking a j...”
“This stuff really makes me happy and if you start a task you'll do a great job . A great wake and bake.”

“I love it! It made me feel creative and giggly. Definitely helped the depression and stress. I did, however, go on the biggest munchie binge which I do not mind considering I need help gaining weight. I would buy this every time a place has it because I can function great during the day with it 😊”
“Cerebral, excellent pain relief, definitely indica dominant. A new favorite.”
“smells great! nice fluffy buds with white crystals all over it! will definitely buy this again from mile high dispensers!”

“Wow no wonder it's called what it is, this gram filled up my grinder with a nice amount to throw right back in the joint.. Now I feel like running a marathon, and when the burnout comes you'll feel like you have. It's more in line with green crack this strain. Up then down, but it's not like you'll be put to sleep. I've tried it at work and still very functional. Highly recommended, just a little harsh in the morning...”

“The taste is a mind trip... name sake two thumbs up. 

The aroma is all Walter White. The taste is like Heisenberg.

Dense feathery beige nugs with moderate amount of clear and amber trich hold a good amount of small thin red hairs. Leaves are green. Good contrasting colors broken up. Smell is very complex and stinky. Lemon, orange, cedar, pepper, flowers, and hops. The aroma is very well balanced with a variety of t...”
“Fantastic strain. Sativa-leaning with a very cerebral, focused high, but has some indica kick too. Looks absolutely gorgeous, tastes and smokes even better. Grab some of this when you can.”
“tasty pain reliefe and a appetite of destruction”
“I enjoyed the super chill, well balanced nature of this strain. Everything I engaged in was done so super mellow, externally, with an on-going internal monologue and heightened awareness. 👏🏽”
“Great taste, great effects... This will be a staple in my selection!”

“Decent arthritis pain relief. Perfect for soaking in a hot tub. And as an added bonus, music visualization 1/2 hour into it. Not much taste or smell, a bit earthy, but smooth vapour even at higher temperatures.”
“Super mellow Stoney high. Helps with anxiety and pain relief. The taste is awesome and it lives up to the greatness of Walter White”
“Great taste, great effects... This will be a staple in my selection!”
“Perfect high to keep me upbeat and productive, while still relaxed and happy enough to enjoy whatever I’m doing.”
“The perfect buzz for chilling at home, watching tv, or just good conversation. Would buy this, and a lot of it if I cross paths with it again.”
“Great!!!”
“Good flavor to this. Really nice smoke.”

“Just got some Walter White OG from Blum on Decatur.  All I did was open the bag, break it up, rolled a j and put it in a smell free tube.  The entire upstairs of my house smelled from just that.  Couldn't wait to puff on it and when I did, the taste was amazing and one who has a high tolerance, I was buzzed out of my brain.  Enjoy it!”

“This is definitely a new favorite of mine! The smell is amazing. Smooth for inhale and overall gives you a great high in an instant! It definitely made me giggly and in the zone, creatively and for the high. The after effects with total relaxtion is a bonus for me. I definitely recommend this strain!”

“I've had this a few times. From different dispensaries. Each batch I've had has been great. This is a consistent strain. I find that often rare. So I appreciate that about this one. It's light, tasty and great for  anxiety.”
“bought this today and it relieved a severe migraine alnost instantly. it tastes great and smokes smooth. highly recommended for pain relief.”

“This was another smooth smoke from Nameless Genetics.  The only reason why I gave it a 4 stars is  I've had better smoke from NG. 

JediForce”

“got this at the chronic boutique today and its test rating was at 25%thc.  I suffer high pain and am allergic to most pain meds and I didn't even need any tylenol after the first bowl. tastes fantastic, kinda fruity a little creamy and strong.”
“very mellow high, had me stumbling haha”
“Love Walter white ! Huge hi within minutes then evens out into an incredible great uplifting hi . It taste great and packs a huge punch !!”
“Looks amazing !! Powerful hi , uplifting ,”

“Very nice tasting. It smells good before and after burning. I rolled a joint after a hard day at work and relaxed for the rest of the night. It helped with my knee pain and it gave a nice head high. Turned on the Xbox and enjoyed a nice evening in”

“Growing a batch of this.. very very white and fast staring cause of the auto afghani kush, but all mine smell like grape spree candy.. very sticky and not tall like a sativa but short and stacked. 16 days into flower and already stinky. How do I upload pics? My plants look way bether then the couple pics already up”
“nice but harsh tasting woody bud, almost tangy...left me happy, calm, a bit talkative. Would be good for anxiety or depression. Pretty good local dispensary strain”

“Decent sativa off the bat. Flavor profile doesn't WOW you..but there is some Earthy undertones. High is a very good mental buzz. Something on the uplifted" side of things. GREAT for activities on a weekend.”"

“Great hybrid strain! Felt a pretty intense head high as my body relaxed and melted into the chair. Not as heavy as my fav indica - G13 and not as buzzy as Green Crack. It’s a nice in-between but strong high. Definite citrus taste and aroma. Smooth smoke that doesn’t give that feeling like your chest is on fire. Walter White will be in my hybrid rotation for sure”
“I love it!!! I usually don’t smoke much but WW is great I can relax and concentrate without anything bothering me. Totally recommend this to others. Ps just got a quarter of it 😛❤️👌🏾”
“Found the potency a bit lacking although more cerebral focused.”
“Its a nice day time smoke. Going out running errands, makes you feel like you can get shit done. Vapes great, tastes great in a doob.”

“This stuff is very mellow. I don't know that I'd smoke it first thing in the morning, but it's got enough go that it would be a good afternoon weed. Not a kickstarter--personally I wouldn't do it before any job I HAD to get done, but I would totally take a hit or two while I was in the middle of a task and feel confident it would energize rather than derail me. Mildly spacey, relaxing, and clear-headed enough to let ...”
“Amazing smell and taste👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻🤘🤘🤘”
“Growers in Nevada. Would love to see this strain on the shelves. :)”
“killer buzz! gives you that second wind to get through the day!”
“Instant high that makes you feel giggly and happy. Cerebral high that helps with anxiety and pain and definitely helped me with appetite. Indica dominant strain for sure. TOP SHELF!”
“Very cerebrally sharp but relaxed experience. This one was pleasantly surprising.”
“Really good day time smoke. Left me in a happy haze for hours!”
“I have live resin of this strain and the flavour is incredible and the high is even better”
